EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.Pivotal Club 10-28-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Subscription Club: October Leaderboard Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
In August we announced a new second-half SPIF to drive subscription sales. If you achieve your second-half quota for subscription software, you'll become part of the "Subscription Club," which earns you and your partner an awesome weekend adventure with top Pivotal salespeople from around the world.
This four-day, three-night adventure <http://info.pivotal.io/CUp00H0qN2rI0ACP2N0dJ0e> taking place on May 21â€”24 2016, at the W Hotel in South Beach, Miami, Florida is adjacent to the Pivotal Club, which takes place the following week in Puerto Rico. As a reminder, if you achieve both your second-half software quota and qualify for Pivotal Club, you and your partner will enjoy a full week of sun and fun in Miami and Puerto Rico.
Last month, we took a look at those of you in the running for the Subscription Club, and below is the latest Leader-board status as of October 26th. Calculations are based on 3rd-quarter actuals, plus 25% of the pipeline for the 2nd-half. We included anyone that is >70%. Note: Your subscription goal is the software threshold for your second half total goal, 50% of your second half goal in Americas, and 70% in EMEA and APJ.
We'll post the leaderboard again next month, so get your deals rolling, and let's get more of you on the board for both the Subscription Club and Pivotal Club!
Subscription Club Details
>200% Americas Steven Kutscher Americas Frank Gall Americas Sharon Ober Americas Paul Carey APJ Keisuke Futakami Americas James Whittington Americas Christopher Bethel Americas Douglas Stubbe EMEA Rached Dabboussi* Americas Paul Chesen APJ Jian Geng* Americas Jeffrey Glenn Americas Keith Salisbury Americas Timothy Kirby APJ Natalina Damayanthi
